code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{changePage}from"../../redux/actions/index";import"./pagination.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Pagination=function Pagination(_ref){var total=_ref.total;var dispatch=useDispatch();var breedsPerPage=useSelector(function(state){return state.breedsPerPage;});var handleClick=function handleClick(pageNumber){dispatch(changePage(pageNumber));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"pagination-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pagination",children:Array.from(Array(Math.ceil(total/breedsPerPage)).keys()).map(function(number){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return handleClick(number+1);},className:"page-button",children:number+1},number);})})});};export default Pagination;
